mapper.select: select vaccine_info.vaccine_dt, vaccine_info.vaccine_name, infection_info.infected_dt, infection_info.disease_name from livestock_info inner join vaccine_info on livestock_info.livestock_id = vaccine_info.livestock_id inner join infection_info on livestock_info.livestock_id = infection_info.livestock_id where livestock_info.user_id = #{user_id} and (year(vaccine_info.vaccine_dt) = #{year} or year(infection_info.infected_dt) =#{year}) and (month(vaccine_info.vaccine_dt)=#{month} or month(infection_info.infected_dt) =#{month})
mapper.insert: insert into vaccine_info (livestock_id, vaccine_name, vaccine_cnt, vaccine_dt, vaccine_yn, reg_dt) values (#{livestock_id}, #{vaccine_name}, #{vaccine_cnt}, #{vaccine_dt}, "n", now())
insert into infection_info (livestock_id, disease_name, infected_cnt, infected_dt) values (#{livestock_id}, #{disease_name}, #{infected_cnt}, #{infected_dt})
mapper.select: select livestock_id, livestock_name from livestock_info where user_id = #{user_id}
